statements: DELETE FROM market_data WHERE volume > 100000 AND date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM market_data WHERE closing_price < 50 AND stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM risk_exposure WHERE risk_factor > 10 AND exposure_level <= 5;
DELETE FROM market_data WHERE id = 1 AND symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM risk_exposure WHERE risk_factor > 50 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM market_data WHERE data_type='sales' AND data_value > 1000;
DELETE FROM risk_exposure WHERE exposure_amount < 500 AND exposure_category='high risk';
